Zelenskyy urged India to support peaceful efforts and emphasized that decisions about Ukraine must involve Ukraine's participation. Discussions also covered sanctions against Russia, particularly restricting energy exports.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ukraine-russia-war-zelenskyy-dials-pm-modi-raises-issue-of-oil-trade-to-meet-in-person-soon/articleshow/123238276.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ukraine-russia-war-zelenskyy-dials-pm-modi-raises-issue-of-oil-trade-to-meet-in-person-soon/articleshow/123238276.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 18:49:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="903894" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123238311,imgsize-903894.cms"/></item><item><title>'Vote theft' row splits K'taka Cong: Minister contradicts Rahul; asked to quit</title><description><![CDATA[Karnataka Minister KN Rajanna criticized his own Congress party for neglecting alleged electoral roll irregularities during their governance, expressing shame over the oversights. Deputy CM DK Shivakumar rebuked Rajanna, disagreeing with his assessment, while speculation arose about Rajanna's potential resignation following his dissenting remarks on vote theft, prompting a meeting with the CM.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/we-should-feel-ashamed-karnataka-minister-rajanna-questions-congress-on-vote-theft-claim-asked-to-quit-post/articleshow/123234622.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/we-should-feel-ashamed-karnataka-minister-rajanna-questions-congress-on-vote-theft-claim-asked-to-quit-post/articleshow/123234622.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 16:10:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SANDEEP MOUDGAL</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="14576" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123235336,imgsize-14576.cms"/></item><item><title>Air India to suspend nonstop Delhi-Washington flights from Sept 1</title><description><![CDATA[Air India will suspend its Delhi-Washington nonstop flights from September 1, 2025. This is due to a shortage of wide-body planes. The airline is revamping its legacy fleet. Passengers can rebook or get full refunds. The retrofit program aims to enhance customer experience. Supply chain issues have delayed the completion to October 2028.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/aircraft-shortage-air-india-to-suspend-nonstops-between-delhi-and-washington-from-september-1/articleshow/123235211.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/aircraft-shortage-air-india-to-suspend-nonstops-between-delhi-and-washington-from-september-1/articleshow/123235211.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 16:09:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SAURABH SINHA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="27492" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123235341,imgsize-27492.cms"/></item><item><title>Exclusive | Watching Carlsen at 2: How 5-yo Aarini became India No. 1 youngest talent</title><description><![CDATA[At just five, Delhi’s Aarini Lahoty is India’s highest-rated chess player in her age group, boasting a FIDE rating of 1551. Introduced to the game by her father-coach Surendar, Aarini began playing as a toddler and now competes in higher age categories. Balancing studies, chess, and play, she dreams of becoming India’s youngest IM and GM.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/exclusive-watching-magnus-carlsen-at-2-how-5-year-old-aarini-lahoty-became-indias-no-1-among-youngest-chess-talents/articleshow/123236359.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/exclusive-watching-magnus-carlsen-at-2-how-5-year-old-aarini-lahoty-became-indias-no-1-among-youngest-chess-talents/articleshow/123236359.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 17:18:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>JYOTIRMOY HALDER</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="80614" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123236399,imgsize-80614.cms"/></item><item><title>Microsoft CEO to employees: No longer enough to be software factory, must become…</title><description><![CDATA[Microsoft is undergoing a significant shift, transitioning from a software manufacturer to an "intelligence engine," according to CEO Satya Nadella. This transformation aims to democratize AI, empowering global users to create their own intelligent tools. Microsoft will focus on building AI systems that enable individuals and organizations to develop customized solutions, redesigning its technology stack to support this new vision.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-ceo-satya-nadella-to-employees-its-no-longer-enough-to-be-software-factory-must-become/articleshow/123230971.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-ceo-satya-nadella-to-employees-its-no-longer-enough-to-be-software-factory-must-become/articleshow/123230971.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 12:34:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1442730" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123230971,imgsize-1442730.cms"/></item><item><title>New I-T Bill passes Lok Sabha: What are top suggestions being included?</title><description><![CDATA[FM Nirmala Sitharaman  tabled the revised New Income Tax Bill 2025 in Parliament. This followed the withdrawal of the original bill. The new version incorporates recommendations from a Parliamentary Select Committee.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/new-income-tax-bill-2025-introduced-in-parliament-what-are-the-top-parliamentary-panel-suggestions-being-included-check-details/articleshow/123232971.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/new-income-tax-bill-2025-introduced-in-parliament-what-are-the-top-parliamentary-panel-suggestions-being-included-check-details/articleshow/123232971.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 14:28:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19382" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123233253,imgsize-19382.cms"/></item><item><title>'Rohit itna marega na tereko': Yuvraj warns content creator - Watch</title><description><![CDATA[Yuvraj Singh jokingly warns a content creator who mimics Rohit Sharma. The mimic is popular for his impressions. Rohit Sharma recently bought a Lamborghini Urus SE. The car has a personalized number plate. It reflects his children's birthdays and jersey number. Rohit last played in IPL 2025. India's ODI series against Bangladesh is cancelled. His next challenge is in Australia.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/rohit-sharma-itna-marega-na-tereko-yuvraj-singh-warns-content-creator-watch/articleshow/123237416.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/rohit-sharma-itna-marega-na-tereko-yuvraj-singh-warns-content-creator-watch/articleshow/123237416.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 18:12:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="60610" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123237580,imgsize-60610.cms"/></item><item><title>'Liberation Day in DC': Trump declares he will end violence in US Capital</title><description><![CDATA[President Trump declared a "liberation day" for Washington, D.C., vowing to eliminate crime and filth while promising to restore the capital to its former glory. He announced a "crime and beautification" plan, increasing federal patrols and criticizing wasteful spending on projects like the Federal Reserve renovation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/liberation-day-in-dc-donald-trump-declares-he-will-end-violence-in-us-capital-claims-he-fixed-border/articleshow/123237824.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/liberation-day-in-dc-donald-trump-declares-he-will-end-violence-in-us-capital-claims-he-fixed-border/articleshow/123237824.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 18:26:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32952" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123237948,imgsize-32952.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump asks Intel CEO to resign: Former directors call for a new company, say ‘Only a dramatic…’</title><description><![CDATA[Amidst security concerns over CEO Lip-Bu Tan's China ties, four former Intel board members are advocating for a radical restructuring. They propose spinning off Intel's manufacturing arm into an independent entity to bolster America's chipmaking capabilities. This move aims to rival TSMC and address national security needs, especially after Intel received significant CHIPS Act funding.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/after-donald-trump-asks-intel-ceo-to-resign-former-directors-call-for-a-new-company-say-only-a-dramatic-/articleshow/123231321.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/after-donald-trump-asks-intel-ceo-to-resign-former-directors-call-for-a-new-company-say-only-a-dramatic-/articleshow/123231321.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 12:52:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="88582" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123231303,imgsize-88582.cms"/></item><item><title>Move over Dhoni! Ex-India captain declares who is World No. 1</title><description><![CDATA[Mohammad Azharuddin praised Syed Kirmani as the world's best wicketkeeper, highlighting his skills against spin and contribution to India's 1983 World Cup victory, at the launch of Kirmani's autobiography. Azharuddin also commended Mohammad Siraj for his outstanding performance in the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy against England, where he emerged as the leading wicket-taker.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/move-over-ms-dhoni-ex-india-captain-declares-who-is-world-no-1-wicketkeeper-batter/articleshow/123234606.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/move-over-ms-dhoni-ex-india-captain-declares-who-is-world-no-1-wicketkeeper-batter/articleshow/123234606.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 15:44:14 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="61698" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123234771,imgsize-61698.cms"/></item><item><title>J&K: BSF troops shoot and injure ‘Pakistani intruder' in Kathua district</title><description><![CDATA[Border Security Force (BSF) troops shot and injured a Pakistani intruder along the International Border in Jammu and Kashmir's Kathua district on Monday. The intruder was part of a group attempting to infiltrate Indian territory near the Hiranagar sector. Alert BSF personnel noticed the group and issued repeated warnings, which were ignored, leading to the firing.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/jk-bsf-troops-shoot-and-injure-pakistani-intruder-in-kathua-district-man-tried-to-cross-border-despite-warnings/articleshow/123237421.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/jk-bsf-troops-shoot-and-injure-pakistani-intruder-in-kathua-district-man-tried-to-cross-border-despite-warnings/articleshow/123237421.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 18:05:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1718656" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123237644,imgsize-1718656.cms"/></item><item><title>Bloating is not normal: How enzyme-based supplements can help reduce water retention</title><description><![CDATA[Feeling bloated after meals is a common issue, often dismissed as normal, but it signals digestive overload. This occurs when food isn't fully broken down, leading to fermentation and gas. Enzyme-based supplements can aid digestion by breaking down complex foods, improving nutrient absorption, and supporting gut balance, ultimately preventing bloating and promoting overall digestive health.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/bloating-is-not-normal-how-enzyme-based-supplements-can-help-reduce-water-retention/articleshow/123233631.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/bloating-is-not-normal-how-enzyme-based-supplements-can-help-reduce-water-retention/articleshow/123233631.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 16:56:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="49294" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123236227,imgsize-49294.cms"/></item><item><title>Former Tesla Dojo lead Ganesh Venkataramanan: Launches DensityAI; revolutionising car AI systems</title><description><![CDATA[Ganesh Venkataramanan, previously with Tesla's Dojo, has launched DensityAI. The startup aims to transform self-driving car AI development. DensityAI focuses on a full-stack AI platform for autonomous vehicles. It addresses computational and data demands. The company seeks to streamline AI training and deployment for automakers. DensityAI plans to expand into robotics.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/meet-ganesh-venkataramanan-former-tesla-dojo-lead-building-densityais-new-all-in-one-ai-system-for-self-driving-cars/articleshow/123236224.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/meet-ganesh-venkataramanan-former-tesla-dojo-lead-building-densityais-new-all-in-one-ai-system-for-self-driving-cars/articleshow/123236224.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 17:16:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="24820" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123236643,imgsize-24820.cms"/></item><item><title>Kap's Cafe attack: Kapil Sharma's security beefed up</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/kaps-cafe-attack-kapil-sharmas-security-beefed-up-move-after-lawrence-bishnoi-gang-takes-responsibility/articleshow/123237016.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/kaps-cafe-attack-kapil-sharmas-security-beefed-up-move-after-lawrence-bishnoi-gang-takes-responsibility/articleshow/123237016.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 17:41:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="761448" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123237195,imgsize-761448.cms"/></item><item><title>Rohit Sharma's new Lamborghini car has the number 3015 - Here's why</title><description><![CDATA[Indian cricket captain Rohit Sharma has acquired a striking red Lamborghini Urus SE in Mumbai, featuring a personalized '3015' number plate. This number cleverly combines his children's birthdays and links to his iconic jersey number, 45. The high-performance Urus SE, priced at Rs 4.57 crore, boasts impressive speed and power.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/rohit-sharmas-new-lamborghini-car-has-the-number-3015-heres-why/articleshow/123236185.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/rohit-sharmas-new-lamborghini-car-has-the-number-3015-heres-why/articleshow/123236185.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 17:08:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="34892" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123236524,imgsize-34892.cms"/></item><item><title>Pigeon feeding row: Jain monk says 'will take up arms if needed'</title><description><![CDATA[Jain monk Muni Nileshchandra Vijay is threatening a hunger strike starting August 13 over the closure of Dadar Kabutarkhana, a traditional pigeon-feeding site. The BMC closed the area citing health concerns, leading to clashes. Vijay alleges political motivation and vows defiance, even against court orders, claiming widespread Jain support.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/maharashtra-pigeon-feeding-row-jain-monk-warns-of-hunger-strike-says-will-take-up-arms-if-needed/articleshow/123236661.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/maharashtra-pigeon-feeding-row-jain-monk-warns-of-hunger-strike-says-will-take-up-arms-if-needed/articleshow/123236661.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 17:12:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="152660" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123236640,imgsize-152660.cms"/></item><item><title>Mahomes gets family, brother Jackson’s support after preseason benching</title><description><![CDATA[Patrick Mahomes, despite limited playtime in the preseason game against the Cardinals, demonstrated his readiness and leadership. Coach Reid praised Mahomes' leadership, emphasizing his importance to the team's Super Bowl aspirations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/patrick-mahomes-backed-by-brother-jackson-and-family-after-being-benched-by-coach-andy-reid-in-preseason/articleshow/123220293.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/patrick-mahomes-backed-by-brother-jackson-and-family-after-being-benched-by-coach-andy-reid-in-preseason/articleshow/123220293.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 22:21:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="505863" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123220303,imgsize-505863.cms"/></item><item><title>Tyreek Hill, ex Keeta Vaccaro rush baby Capri to ER; now recovering</title><description><![CDATA[Tyreek Hill's eight-month-old daughter, Capri, was rushed to the emergency room after developing alarming symptoms, causing significant concern for her mother, Keeta Vaccaro. Despite ongoing family turmoil, the outpouring of support from fans highlights the shared relief and gratitude for Capri's recovery.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/nfl-star-tyreek-hill-and-ex-wife-keeta-vaccaro-face-every-parents-nightmare-as-baby-capri-rushed-to-er-now-on-the-mend/articleshow/123180273.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/nfl-star-tyreek-hill-and-ex-wife-keeta-vaccaro-face-every-parents-nightmare-as-baby-capri-rushed-to-er-now-on-the-mend/articleshow/123180273.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 10:37:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="28838" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123180418,imgsize-28838.cms"/></item><item><title>Taylor Swift on going public with Travis Kelce: 'Proud of each other'</title><description><![CDATA[Taylor Swift openly embraced her relationship with Travis Kelce, contrasting sharply with her past privacy, particularly with Joe Alwyn. Swift explained to TIME that they proudly support each other, dismissing the need to hide their romance. Since 2023, they've been publicly affectionate, attending events and date nights, fueling engagement speculations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/were-proud-of-each-other-taylor-swift-shared-the-heartfelt-reason-for-going-public-with-travis-kelce-after-years-of-keeping-her-relationships-private/articleshow/123196110.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/were-proud-of-each-other-taylor-swift-shared-the-heartfelt-reason-for-going-public-with-travis-kelce-after-years-of-keeping-her-relationships-private/articleshow/123196110.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 00:57:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="821068" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123196109,imgsize-821068.cms"/></item><item><title>Alex Ovechkin speaks out: Why he won't join NHL with son Sergei</title><description><![CDATA[Alex Ovechkin, the NHL's top goal scorer, has dismissed the possibility of playing professionally with his son, Sergei, despite the six-year-old's impressive performance at a recent event in Moscow. She acknowledged the pressure but highlighted the motivation it provides, drawing inspiration from Yuvraj Singh.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/womens-odi-world-cup-trophy-unveiled-we-want-to-break-that-barrier-harmanpreet-kaur-eyes-icc-glory/articleshow/123232942.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/womens-odi-world-cup-trophy-unveiled-we-want-to-break-that-barrier-harmanpreet-kaur-eyes-icc-glory/articleshow/123232942.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 14:16:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="82694" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123233063,imgsize-82694.cms"/></item><item><title>FASTag annual pass: Rs 3,000 for 200 trips – How to get by Aug 15, 2025</title><description><![CDATA[The National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) will launch the FASTag Annual Pass on August 15, 2025, offering private vehicle owners a prepaid plan of 200 toll crossings or one year of validity for Rs 3,000. This initiative aims to streamline toll payments and reduce the need for frequent recharges on national highways and expressways, enhancing the travel experience.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/auto/news/fastag-annual-pass-rs-3000-cost-200-toll-trips-how-to-get-yours-before-15-august-2025-and-everything-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123182482.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/auto/news/fastag-annual-pass-rs-3000-cost-200-toll-trips-how-to-get-yours-before-15-august-2025-and-everything-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123182482.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 12:23:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TIMESOFINDIA.COM</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="35360" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123182584,imgsize-35360.cms"/></item><item><title>'They will lose to India’: Ex-cricketer doubts Aus & SA’s WTC final chances</title><description><![CDATA[Aakash Chopra suggested that both Australia and South Africa, the finalists of the previous WTC cycle, might face difficulties in reaching the 2027 final. Despite Australia's strong start, their tour of India and an aging bowling attack could hinder their progress. South Africa's challenging away series in the subcontinent also diminish their chances of qualifying, according to Chopra.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/wtc-final-they-will-leave-india-after-losing-former-cricketer-doubts-australia-south-africas-chances/articleshow/123231274.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/wtc-final-they-will-leave-india-after-losing-former-cricketer-doubts-australia-south-africas-chances/articleshow/123231274.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 12:57:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="63580" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123231384,imgsize-63580.cms"/></item><item><title>‘They are financially strong ...’: Gadkari’s veiled ‘dadagiri’ jibe amid Trump tariffs</title><description><![CDATA[Nitin Gadkari indirectly criticised US President Donald Trump's tariff policies, asserting that financial strength and technological advancement shouldn't lead to bullying. He emphasised India's commitment to its culture of global welfare, even with economic growth. Gadkari also highlighted the importance of innovation and research to boost India's economic growth and self-reliance.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/they-are-financially-strong-nitin-gadkaris-veiled-dadagiri-jibe-amid-trump-tariffs-emphasises-need-for-india-to-boost-exports/articleshow/123229129.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/they-are-financially-strong-nitin-gadkaris-veiled-dadagiri-jibe-amid-trump-tariffs-emphasises-need-for-india-to-boost-exports/articleshow/123229129.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 12:36:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1599142" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123229314,imgsize-1599142.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[Hindalco arm Novelis Q1 net income dips 36% to $96 million; net sales up 13% at $4.7 billion]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/stocks/hindalco-share-price-arm-novelis-net-income-down-net-sales-up-ebitda-cashflow-high-aluminium-prices-19652122.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Net sales for the quarter rose 13% to $4.7 billion, driven by higher average aluminium prices and a 1% increase in total rolled product shipments to 963 kilotonnes. Higher beverage packaging shipments were partially offset by lower automotive and specialty shipments. Shares of Hindalco Industries Ltd ended at ₹676, up by ₹3.20, or 0.48%, on the BSE today (August 11).]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[The offer size is estimated at ₹560 crore, with a floor price set at ₹507 per share, sources in the know told CNBC-TV18. The floor price represents a discount of 4% to the company’s current market price.       <description><![CDATA[The transaction, which will be executed in cash, involves the purchase of shares at ₹80,000 at par value.       <title><![CDATA[Poly Medicure cuts FY26 revenue guidance amid Europe slowdown, domestic market stays robust]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/earnings/poly-medicure-q1-fy26-earnings-revenue-slowdown-guidance-19652074.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Poly Medicure has revised its FY26 revenue growth guidance to around 16%, down from an earlier estimate of 20%, citing a weak June quarter impacted by slower performance in Europe. While the domestic business continues to show robust growth at about 30%, the export segment’s growth target has been lowered to 5–10%. Despite challenges, the company expects margins to remain comfortable at 26–27%. In Q1 FY26, Poly Medicure posted a 4.8% rise in revenue and a 25.7% jump in profit after tax.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 11 Aug 2025 17:46:44 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>
      <guid><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/earnings/poly-medicure-q1-fy26-earnings-revenue-slowdown-guidance-19652074.htm]]></guid>
      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2024/05/poly-medicure12-2024-05-04bd33257f73d72b32021ce2341b2805.jpg"/>
    </item>

      <description><![CDATA[DEE Development Engineers is targeting 18–20% EBITDA margins in FY26 after posting a strong June quarter.       <title><![CDATA[Policybazaar for Business flags low use of parametric insurance: How it can tackle climate risks]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/finance/policybazaar-flags-low-use-parametric-insurance-how-can-tackle-climate-risks-19647330.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Unlike traditional insurance, parametric products offer automatic payouts when a weather event crosses a pre-set limit — no paperwork, no surveyors, and no disputes. If rainfall drops below a threshold or wind speeds fall short, policyholders get paid in days.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Fri, 1 Aug 2025 16:38:22 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Anshul</dc:creator>

      <description><![CDATA[In the mutual fund segment, CAMS' assets under management (AuM) crossed a major milestone of ₹50 lakh crore in June 2025, maintaining its market leadership with approximately 68% share by AUM.       <description><![CDATA[The company posted a net profit of ₹2,007 crore, significantly beating the CNBC-TV18 poll estimate of ₹1,765 crore and more than doubling its profit from ₹918.6 crore in the same quarter last year.
